• To prevent hypothermia during a massive transfusion, fluids and red cells should be warmed during with an 
approved, validated warming device. Never use water, kettles, etc. to warm. 
Guidelines on the management of acute moderate/severe transfusion related adverse events 
• Transfusion reactions may vary from mild (febrile non-haemolytic, allergic, etc) to life-threatening (acute 
haemolysis, TACO, TRALI, etc.)
